segments.text: What kind of job do you intend to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to do some management job since I have three-year's work history .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are your plans if you were hired ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would apply my specialty and experience to my job and gradually move up to the management level in this company .
segments.speaker: S2
